mapper.select: SELECT id,memberId,message,create_time FROM ( (SELECT id,from_id as memberId,message,create_time FROM message_info WHERE from_id = #{memberId} ) UNION (SELECT id,from_id as memberId,message,create_time FROM message_info WHERE to_id = #{memberId} ) ORDER BY create_time DESC) as tmp GROUP BY tmp.memberId ORDER BY tmp.create_time DESC
